title: Topping Consent
itunes:title: Topping Consent
description:
Today on the show, we had Democrat Gary Chambers Jr. stopped by, where he spoke about Louisiana Senate Run, Provocative Campaign Ads and using his voice for change. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a Connecticut high school, for telling students to use pizza toppings as metaphors for sex, which turned into a topic discussion for listeners to call up to give their opinion about the schools teaching methods on sex.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show, we had Democrat Gary Chambers Jr. stopped by, where he spoke about Louisiana Senate Run, Provocative Campaign Ads and using his voice for change. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a Connecticut high school, for telling students to use pizza toppings as metaphors for sex, which turned into a topic discussion for listeners to call up to give their opinion about the schools teaching methods on sex.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
